job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: HERE's OneMap team is looking for a Data Scientist that will helping with the creation of mapping products that are highly available, performant, and near real-time and edge computing on vehicle. We drive continuous re-architecture improving service latency, accuracy of content, service robustness, and cost-of-ownership. Relentlessly eliminating undifferentiated work, services, content domains, and products (both new and old) in favor of single sourced and open building blocks. As owners of Here’s front-line systems for both ingestion and delivery to automotive customers, we lead innovation in both re-use, automation of operations and next evolution of products.<br><br><br><br>Who are you?<br><br>-2+ years of professional experience (All levels including Graduate Student)<br>-Python or C++<br>-Object detection / tracking<br>-Hands-on experience with designing and training deep learning models (CNN, RNN, LSTM, PointNet etc.) on large-scale datasets in a distributed environment<br>-(Nice to Have) Experience with applying deep learning techniques to sensor fusion, 3D object detection, tracking, or predicting the future behavior of agents<br>-Autonomous driving<br><br>
